entry.def: If you are bedevilled by something unpleasant, it causes you a lot of problems over a period of time.

example.ex: His career was bedevilled by injury.
example.tran: 他的职业生涯深受伤病的困扰。

example.ex: The development has been bedevilled with problems.
example.tran: 发展受到了诸多问题的困扰。

means.word_mean: 2. be confusing or perplexing to; cause to be unable to think clearly;

auth_sentence.content: The questions also bedevil Ms. Brickman.
